document_data.name: Mount Turbold
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Turbold''' was a mountain in the [[Kuldin Peaks]] of [[Erlkazar]].
document_data.History: Long before the kingdom of Erlkazar came into existence, an ancient battle between [[giant]]s and [[Dwarf|dwarves]] from [[Shanatar]] took place on this mountain and in the [[Turbold Vale|valley to the north]]. The mountain and the valley were named after the leader of the dwarves, [[Turbold]].
document_data.Rumor's: Turbold's burial site was supposedly located in a crypt hidden somewhere in the mountain, containing his treasures and those of the dwarves he led who were also buried there. [[Turbold's Golden Axe]] was the most famous artifact said to be resting there.
